long_description: These Atlas 2-piece LockJaw(TM) snowshoe poles offer increased stability and can be easily adjusted thanks to intuitive locking mechanisms. 2-section, lightweight and sturdy 6000-series aluminum poles with seamless shafts adjust from 105 to 130 cm (41.3 to 51.2 in.). LockJaw mechanism is easy to use with gloves and works by flicking the lock open, setting the length and then clamping the lock closed, ensuring a secure setting. Rubber grips are ergonomically shaped for comfort; adjustable nylon webbing wrist straps improve support and control. Steel tips on the Atlas 2-piece LockJaw snowshoe poles supply biting traction; removable snow baskets provide flotation in powder and soft snow.
